title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio and blog built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a modern design with dark mode support, responsive layouts, and a blog system with MDX support.

title: Task Management API
description: RESTful API for task management with authentication, role-based access control, and real-time notifications using WebSockets.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather dashboard that displays current conditions and 7-day forecasts. Features location search, favorite locations, and weather alerts.

title: CLI Todo App
description: A lightweight command-line todo application with support for projects, tags, priorities, and due dates. Data stored locally in JSON format.
